description: List action items with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can list all action items. Non-admins can list action items only when their memberships and team membership satisfy the ActionItemPolicy scope (membership in or above the responsible organization, including broker/manager membership for customers, or being on the action item team).
validation_notes: Status and kind filters must use allowed enum values. Boolean filters (is-deleted, is-completed, requires-xbe-feature, is-unplanned) use strict true/false values. Due-on and completed-on filters expect YYYY-MM-DD dates. Responsible-organization and source filters use Type|ID values. responsible-person filter accepts "null" to match items without a responsible person. If is-deleted is not provided, the server defaults it to false.

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --completed-on
flags.description: Filter by completed date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --completed-on-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum completed date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --completed-on-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum completed date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --created-by
flags.description: Filter by creator user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --due-on
flags.description: Filter by due date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --due-on-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum due date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --due-on-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum due date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --expected-benefit-amount-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum expected benefit amount

flags.name: --expected-benefit-amount-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum expected benefit amount

flags.name: --expected-cost-amount-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum expected cost amount

flags.name: --expected-cost-amount-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum expected cost amount

flags.name: --expected-net-benefit-amount-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum expected net benefit amount

flags.name: --expected-net-benefit-amount-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum expected net benefit amount

flags.name: --incident
flags.description: Filter by incident ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --is-completed
flags.description: Filter by completion status (true/false)

flags.name: --is-deleted
flags.description: Filter by deleted status (true/false)

flags.name: --is-unplanned
flags.description: Filter by unplanned status (true/false)

flags.name: --kind
flags.description: Filter by kind (comma-separated: feature,integration,sombrero,bug_fix,change_management,data_seeding,training)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of enum values: feature, integration, sombrero, bug_fix, change_management, data_seeding, training.

flags.name: --meeting
flags.description: Filter by meeting ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --parent-action-item
flags.description: Filter by parent action item ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of action item IDs.

flags.name: --priority
flags.description: Filter by priority
flags.validation: Enum values set by the server (low, medium, high).

flags.name: --project
flags.description: Filter by project ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --q
flags.description: Full-text search

flags.name: --requires-xbe-feature
flags.description: Filter by XBE feature requirement (true/false)

flags.name: --responsible-organization
flags.description: Filter by responsible organization (Type|ID, comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --responsible-person
flags.description: Filter by responsible person user ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of user IDs; "null" matches items without a responsible person.

flags.name: --root-cause
flags.description: Filter by root cause ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of root cause IDs.

flags.name: --source
flags.description: Filter by source (Type|ID, comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --status
flags.description: Filter by status (comma-separated: editing,ready_for_work,in_progress,in_verification,complete,on_hold)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of enum values: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, in_verification, complete, on_hold.

flags.name: --team-member
flags.description: Filter by team member user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --tracker
flags.description: Filter by tracker ID (comma-separated for multiple)
